Title: Prohibits the use of pesticides at children's overnight or summer day camps
Summary: Prohibits the use of pesticides at children's overnight or summer day camps; provides an exception where emergency application is approved by local or state officials.
LawCode: Ren §1396 to be §1397, add §1396, Pub Health L; amd §33-0303, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the use of pesticides at children's overnight or summer day camp
